comments.body: Why is this change necessary? Scanning other client implementations I see `c.client.APIVersion()` or `c.r.APIVersion()` but never `latest.GroupOrDie`

$ ./kubectl delete jobs/pi
W0928 12:12:13.210531   71463 helper.go:232] Server does not support API version 'experimental/v1alpha1'. Falling back to 'v1'.
I think it is because jobs is the only experimental resource that uses DeleteOpts?

I think the horizontalpodautoscaler code will also fail if that line is executed. I think Eric's fix is a temporary one. In the future, apart from the ExperimentalClient, struct like ehorizontalpodautoscaler shall contain a RESTClient as well.

The error is `no kind "DeleteOptions" is registered for version "experimental/v1alpha1"
`, not the one I said above.
Do you want to just add `UpdateStatus` here?  It is not much extra code.  Just copy what is done in pkg/client/unversioned/pods.go
